'''Golden House Maiden Essential Oil''' is a perfume that can be crafted with [[Alchemy]] by using [[Golden House Maiden]] during the {{Quest|Three Poignant Perfumes}}.

==Alchemy==

|type = Crafting
|Golden House Maiden = 1
|sort = Golden House Maiden
